section.title: Enabling ESX Compute Instance(s) Resize Feature
section.para: The following feature is disabled by default:

listitem.para: Resize - this feature allows you to change the size of a Compute instance by changing its flavor. See the OpenStack User Guide for more details on its use.

section.para: If you want to configure and re-size ESX compute instance(s), perform the following steps:

listitem.para: Log in to the lifecycle manager.
Edit the ~ /helion/my_cloud/config/nova/nova.conf.j2 to add the following parameter under Policy:

listitem.screen: cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "<commit message>"
